name: Matt Haig
bio: Matt Haig is an English author and journalist. He has written both fiction and non-fiction books for children and adults, often in the speculative fiction genre. His work often explores themes of mental health and human nature.

name: Andy Weir
bio: Andy Weir is an American novelist and former computer programmer. He is best known for his debut novel, "The Martian". His works are known for their scientific accuracy and humor.

name: James Clear
bio: James Clear is an author, and speaker focused on habits, decision-making, and continuous improvement. His book, "Atomic Habits," has sold over 15 million copies worldwide and has been translated into over 50 languages.

name: Alex Michaelides
bio: Alex Michaelides is a bestselling British-Cypriot author and screenwriter. His debut novel, "The Silent Patient," was a No. 1 New York Times bestseller and has been sold in a record-breaking 49 countries.

name: Frank Herbert
bio: Frank Herbert was an American science fiction author best known for his novel "Dune" and its five sequels. The Dune saga is one of the best-selling science fiction series of all time.

name: Tara Westover
bio: Tara Westover is an American memoirist, essayist and historian. Her memoir, "Educated", debuted at #1 on The New York Times bestseller list and was a finalist for a number of national awards.
